TheWitchHouse.text: You feel the house actually breathe and speak your name. Lose 1 Sanity.

InnerSanctum.text: Pay your monthly dues of $3 or lose 2 Sanity from strange dreams sent to you by Carl Sanford when he kicks you out of the Order. If you are kicked out, lose your Silver Twilight Membership.

SilverTwilightLodge.text: "Care to join the Order?" Carl Sanford and several of his henchmen ask. If you accept, pay $3 and take a Silver Twilight Membership. If you decline, pass a Will (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina as the henchmen assist you out the door. Whether you pass or not, move to the street.
